name: Phoenix Squadron: Northern Star (Alpha)
description:
Phoenix Squadron: Northern Star lets you become an ace in an alternate reality Earth in beautiful graphics. Soar through the skies downing enemies, but you're not the only one who can down enemies left and right... Phoenix Squadron will have a massive multiplayer front - WIP and a endless arcade mode - BETA.

===========

Important

===========

After launching the game go into a mission then close the game
then you wont get a random Mission Failure prompt
And stop immediately writing a review the second you get any bug, Just report it, I can fix the bug as long as you report it, if you dont ill never know about it.
